definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Plum blossom or Quince blossom reminds us that new things can always grow.
sentences.chinese: 梅花或海棠花提醒我們新事物時刻在改變。

sentences.english: We were here just for these crabapple trees and flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我們來中山公園其實是爲了這條道，爲了這些海棠花。

sentences.english: The  Chinese flowering crabapple looks still even  more  charming against  the  green leaves.
sentences.chinese: 在綠葉的映襯下，海棠花顯得更加嬌豔。

sentences.english: Every mid-summer, the wild crabapple blossoms filled valley, fragrance overflowing.
sentences.chinese: 每逢仲夏時節，野生海棠花開滿溝谷，清香四溢。

sentences.english: Crab apple flowers stand besides Yulan flowers shyly, red plumb and green thin, cute after rain.
sentences.chinese: 悄立其後的是海棠花，紅肥綠瘦，雨後清麗。

sentences.english: The Chinese flowering crabapple looks still even more charming against the green leaves.
sentences.chinese: 在綠葉的映照下，海棠花顯得更加嬌嫩豔麗。

sentences.english: Begonias are prized equally for their flower as well as their showy leaves.
sentences.chinese: 海棠花之所以得到很高的讚賞也有它漂亮葉子的功勞。

sentences.english: Begonia flower did not fall, however, and it is in line of sight from my feet.
sentences.chinese: 然而海棠花沒有倒下去，它又從我的視線中站起來。

sentences.english: Do you know, the chinese flowering crabapple is also called Miss-grass.
sentences.chinese: 知道嗎？海棠花的名字又叫結運花，思鄉草。

definition: Mudan District of Heze City 菏澤市|菏泽市[He2 ze2 Shi4], Shandong/Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
plum blossom/clubs ♣ (a suit in card games)/wintersweet (dialect)
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
